item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>Also Superman, Christpher Reeve died yesterday, another sad loss to the public and his family. </p>
item.content:encoded: Also Superman, Christpher Reeve died yesterday, another sad loss to the public and his family.

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p>In McCarthy's bar he described many of the places I knew in my childhood visits to Ireland and I could "hear" the conversations!! He also had the same feeling of belonging there even though he had been brought up in England. We attended a reading of his at the local Wolsey Theatre and he was also a good performer - he autographed Dad's copy of the Road to McCarthy. A sad loss so young.</p>
item.content:encoded: In McCarthy’s bar he described many of the places I knew in my childhood visits to Ireland and I could “hear” the conversations!! He also had the same feeling of belonging there even though he had been brought up in England. We attended a reading of his at the local Wolsey Theatre and he was also a good performer – he autographed Dad’s copy of the Road to McCarthy. A sad loss so young.
